title: How to compile PyTorch from source with custom CMake options?
body_html: I want to compile PyTorch with custom CMake flags/options. However, it looks like setup.py doesn't read any of the environmental variables for those options while compilation. More specifically, I am trying to set the options for Python site-packages and Python includes. I wonder how I can set these options before compilation and without manually changing the CMakesLists.txt?
